front.title: Security Parameter Index multiplexed Network Address Translation (SPINAT)

abstract.t: This drafts defines a Security Parameter Index multiplexed Network Address Translator (SPINAT). The SPINAT method uses the SPI value of ESP packets to de-multiplex multiple IP addresses on single IP address. The solution presented in this draft requires a state in the SPINAT node and in the peer node. The state establishment requires a control signaling messages carrying the SPI values.
